description: Alice cancels a meeting with Bob on Friday due to client travel. Single delete event with calendar context.

events.title: Meeting with Bob
events.reasoning: Alice explicitly cancels 'our meeting on Friday' due to client travel. She declines Bob's offer to reschedule, saying 'let's just cancel for now.' Matches calendar event [1].

mock_llm_response.summary: Cancelled the Friday meeting with Bob.

notes: Reference datetime is Wednesday 2026-02-18, so 'Friday' resolves to 2026-02-20. Alice explicitly says 'cancel' and rejects rescheduling.
